tasks.label: 🚀 启动SSLAB设备模拟器服务器
args: Write-Host '🔄 正在清理占用的端口...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; Write-Host '📂 切换到服务器目录...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Set-Location 'D:\CODE\SSLAB-HMI\Device-Simulator-Server'; Write-Host '🚀 启动SSLAB设备模拟器服务器...' -ForegroundColor Green; node src/server.js

tasks.label: 🛑 停止所有Node进程
args: Write-Host '🛑 正在停止所有Node.js进程...' -ForegroundColor Red; Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host '✅ 所有Node.js进程已停止' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: 🔧 重启SSLAB设备模拟器服务器
args: Write-Host '� 停止现有服务器...' -ForegroundColor Red; Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 3; Write-Host '� 重新启动服务器...' -ForegroundColor Green; Set-Location 'D:\CODE\SSLAB-HMI\Device-Simulator-Server'; node src/server.js
